li.postpend: Short for Laser-Guided Infantry Support, pronounce it as aegis if you can convince yourself "L" sounds like "AE". Minature missile with low-end laser guidance, designed to be carried by infantry or light armored vehicles, capable of beam-riding guidance, inertia guidance or unguided dumb fire. The missile comes in protective packaging that can also be used as a disposable launcher.

ThingDef.label: HEAT LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will deal a large amount of damage with high armor penetration in a single tile.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: thermobaric LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will cause a large explosion with low armor penetration, and a low chance of starting fire.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: frag LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will cause a small explosion and send large amount of fragments around.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: cluster LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will send large amounts of small bomblets around.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: incendiary LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will start fire across a large area.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: smoke LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will spread a large cloud of smoke.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: firefoam LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will spread fire retardant foam over a large area.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: EMP LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will cause an EMP explosion that disrupts electronics.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: Nuclear LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile is armed with a nuclear warhead that will cause huge damage in a small area, light fire over a medium area and stun people in a large radius.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: illumination LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will light a illumination flare that lasts 3 hours above impact location.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: minelayer LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will spread several ADMs around impact point.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: holodecoy LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will deploy a decoy that lasts 6 hours at impact point.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: toxic LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will continuously spread toxic gas to surronding area.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: deadLife LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will continuously spread deadlife dust to surronding area.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.

ThingDef.label: disruptor LGIS tube
ThingDef.description: This missile will light a bioferrite disruptor flare that lasts 4 hours above impact location.

li.description: Extend the sights and switch the launcher to indirect fire mode, or fold it back to direct fire mode.
